bug.author: lostella
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
Some tests started to fail pretty frequently on Windows, see e.g. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/gluon-ts/pull/1061/checks?check_run_id=1181936080>logs from this run</denchmark-link> . It appears to be some issue with processes trying to access the same files, so it looks like it's related to the data loader.
